summary: Project focused on fixing and finalizing the STYO Tech Neon branding assets and ensuring correct frontend loading (logo, favicon/app icons), with confirmed asset paths.
architectural_notes: Store logo assets under public/assets and ensure header/logo components reference exact existing paths.
Use icon-only asset for favicon/app icon; keep full logo for header/desktop/mobile responsive rendering.
known_issues: Frontend logo not correctly visible due to broken/mismatched asset path(s); requires correcting public asset placement and header references.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Tech neon full logo (icon + STYO text), transparent background, subtle sharp glow, optimized vector (styo-logo-tech-neon-full.dim_1200x400.svg)
- Tech neon icon-only mark, transparent background, subtle sharp glow, optimized vector (styo-logo-tech-neon-icon.dim_512x512.svg)
- Tech neon icon-only mark, transparent background (styo-logo-tech-neon-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Tech neon icon-only mark, transparent background, 512x512 (styo-logo-tech-neon-appicon.dim_512x512.png)
- Tech neon favicon, transparent background, 32x32 (styo-logo-tech-neon-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
- White monochrome full logo (icon + STYO text), transparent background, optimized vector (styo-logo-white-full.dim_1200x400.svg)
- White monochrome icon-only mark, transparent background, optimized vector (styo-logo-white-icon.dim_512x512.svg)

existing_features.title: Generate and add the finalized official “STYO Tech Neon” logo asset set as background-free, optimized vector assets: full logo (icon + STYO text) and icon-only versions, with a subtle/sharp glow (reduced blur) and correct proportions/aspect ratio, ensuring the SVGs contain no rasterized glow effects and scale cleanly on mobile and desktop.

Export and include the required raster deliverables for the finalized logo set: a 512x512 PNG app icon, a 32x32 favicon, and a white monochrome version (full logo and icon-only) as SVG (and include corresponding PNGs where specified by imageRequirements).

Ensure the frontend loads the logo and favicon from the correct existing public asset paths by verifying/updating references in the Header, Footer, and index.html to point to the final generated filenames, and ensure no broken asset paths remain.

Confirm in a developer-facing note (e.g., a short comment near the Header logo usage) the exact asset paths currently used by the app for: (1) header/footer full logo, and (2) favicon, matching the files shipped in frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Finalize official STYO Tech Neon logo set: clean background-free export, optimized SVGs (no raster glow), proper proportions, reduced blur, scalable across mobile/desktop; deliver full logo SVG, icon-only SVG, 512x512 PNG, 32x32 favicon, and white monochrome version; confirm exact asset path used by frontend.
